AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Application for Non-Material amendment to Planning Permission ref: 18/14541/HOU (Erection of single storey rear extension and outbuilding in rear garden) dated 15/08/2018. Amendments to roof and fenestration of outbuilding
decision_conditions: The proposed amendments are considered not to be non material as provided for in section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that Condition 24 (BREEAM rating) of planning permission 19/00330/FUL are hereby approved subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

Confirm proposed works - your sketch plan shows six trees labelled T1-T6, but the list of works shows two T4 trees. Please check and amend the listed works for each tree.Please also clarify the following works:T.3 Conifers - how much in meters will this be trimmed?T.4(?) Robinia - how much in metres will this be reduced by?T.5(?) Front conifer - are works to reduce by 3-4m?
